snippet: GOLDSTEIN--Linda Newman. Linda, we will love and miss you forever. Our deepest sympathy to Neil and Sara. Nancy Kestenbaum Moses, Bill Moses, Marcia Potash, Howie Friedman 1/3...
lead_paragraph: GOLDSTEIN--Linda Newman. Linda, we will love and miss you forever. Our deepest sympathy to Neil and Sara. Nancy Kestenbaum Moses, Bill Moses, Marcia Potash, Howie Friedman 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDSTEIN, LINDA NEWMAN
